snippet.title: Christmas Stories: A Christmas Carol
snippet.description:
iPad: http://bigfi.sh/1cX4091

On Christmas Eve three ghosts of Christmas give Ebenezer Scrooge's nephew a chance to straighten his uncle's life. Take a journey in this incredible Collector's Edition!

• GO TIME-TRAVELING WITH GHOSTS OF CHRISTMAS
Meet the Ghosts of Christmas Past, Present and Yet to Come so that Scrooge can be saved by overcoming the intrigues of his dark self.

• TINY TIM IS SERIOUSLY ILL
Only your uncle can bring the necessary medicine but the bottle with the pills is broken. Will you be able to rescue the boy and your uncle's soul?

• GIVE SCROOGE A CHANCE!
He is asking you to come visit him though he never showed any fondness towards his relatives. Will Scrooge have time to enjoy the happy life with his new family?

• UNLOCK THIS AMAZING COLLECTOR'S EDITION FOR GREAT BONUSES!
Hidden snow Christmas balls and intricate morphing penguins are abundant throughout the story and the Victorian cats return in the bonus chapter!

TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME!
